**Tender Notice**

**Title:** CCGS Samuel Risley - Internal Communication System
**Tender Reference Number**: PW-__MD-049-28939
**Solicitation Number**: F7049-210290/C
**Translator Agreement Number**: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

**Tender Description**

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is inviting bids for a Ship Internal Communication System for the CCGS Samuel Risley. This system will meet the operational requirements of the vessel and provide efficient communication in both normal and emergency conditions.

The system must be delivered by July 2023.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Free Trade Agreements (FTAs) with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the United Kingdom.
